page.title: About me
page.content:
This is just a random collection of things about me. I guess it's your call which social media profile you choose to find out more about me...

Core beliefs

  • hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard, so work hard and use your talent.
  • self-reflection is the basis for personal growth.
  • don't mistake movement for progress.
  • simplicity beats complexity, always.
  • true success requires sacrifice.
  • automation reduces mental load.
  • deep work is essential.
  • strive for Ikigai.
  • keep learning.
  • stay focused.
  • relax.
  • rest.
  • be.

“Champions aren't made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them-a desire, a dream, a vision. They have to have the skill, and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.”

Things I enjoy

  • self-improvement
  • critical thinking
  • humbleness
  • automation and data analysis
  • deep work and focus
  • minimalism/essentialism

You can find technologies I like here.
